name: Cat`s Life
description:
Cat's Life is an origami-style clicker. You have to build buildings, populate them with new cats and catch delicious mice with your paws.

For the development of a Feline village, you need to monitor the satiety indicator and feed the cats with freshly caught mice in time.

Sometimes the Mouse King appears from the burrows only for a moment, for whose capture we get more satiety points.

Control:

  • Moving the camera – WASD;
  • Distance and approximation – mouse wheel;
  • Q,E - rotate house;
  • Catching mice – LBM (left mouse button);
  • Building houses – you need to go to the building menu (click on the arrow on the right) and select a house, then click LBM to build it.

The game was made for ScoreSpace Jam #24
